bug.author: Riccorl
bug.description:
When installing allennlp-models 1.0.0 through pip with <denchmark-code>pip install allennlp-models </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/allenai/allennlp-models/blob/master/allennlp_models/structured_prediction/tools/srl-eval.pl>srl-eval.pl</denchmark-link> file is missing.

comments.comment: You are right! I made a fix in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/allenai/allennlp-models/pull/96>allenai/allennlp-models#96</denchmark-link> .
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/dirkgr>@dirkgr</denchmark-link> this is just a friendly ping to make sure you haven't forgotten about this issue
